markdownRemark.html:
“8/16”

I’m thinking of a monthly and weekly focused blog especially about topics I’m really digging and experimenting with and one of them that pops into my head at most (well I decide on it everyday) is my ketogenic lifestyle. So I started to talk about it in this blog, but now I will try to maintain a workable track of my experiences from this lifechanging decision, so this is to follow through the first one…

I have been doing intermittent fasting for the past 13 days (I track all my activities with Daylio)
